authorCommits.message: Bump Avo to v2.36.2

fix: authorize show controls actions (#1848)

* fix: authorize show controls actions

* simplify and rename can_see_the_actions_button? method
fix: belongs to field target inside tab -> panel -> row (#1847)

fix: location field new view (#1846)

* fix: location field new view

* Update lib/avo/fields/base_field.rb

* rename method name

* use foreign_key to assign value for belongs_to fields

* add spec

---------

Co-authored-by: Adrian Marin <adrian@adrianthedev.com>

* spec

fix: allow nil values on grid cover (#1832)

fix: tab visibility (#1826)

* hide has many tab by policy

improvement: apply policy scope on has many search query (#1824)

* improvement: apply policy scope on has many search query

* rescue not defined error

* better approach and test

* fix specs
